duck: Digital image processing - Digital image processing is the use of computer algorithms to perform image processing on digital images.
CAD - Computer-aided design (CAD) is the use of computer systems to assist in the creation, modification, analysis, or optimization of a design.
Flat panel display - Flat panel displays encompass a growing number of electronic visual display technologies.
A display device is an output device for presentation of information in visual or tactile form (the latter used for example in tactile electronic displays for blind people).
Computer graphics - Computer graphics are graphics created using computers and the representation of image data by a computer specifically with help from specialized graphic hardware and software.

wiki.text:
s, LED display and VF display, top to bottom.]]

A 'display device' is an output device for presentation of information in
visual<ref name="University of West Florida"></ref> or tactile form (the latter
used for example in tactile electronic displays for blind people).<ref
name="Office of the Chief information Officer"></ref> When the input
information is supplied as an electrical signal, the display is called an
electronic display.

Common applications for [[electronic visual display]]s are televisions or
computer monitors.
wiki.title: Display device
